entry.title: Viper Women’s Spats
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Women - Spats
Price: 45.00

The Viper Women’s Spats are light weight, moisture wicking and offer the perfect amount of compression for maximum comfort. Created with a polymer spandex blend, these compression pants will not lose their stretch even with intense training. Great as MMA and BJJ spats, for surfing, watersports and as workout compression pants for women.

Why XMARTIAL Spats:

  • Anti-slip gel panel added technology for extra grip and comfort.
  • Crafted with the finest fabrics to withstand the toughest training conditions. 
  • Moist-wicking technology to keep away sweats.
  • Fully sublimated graphics that won't crack, peel, or fade over time and maintain a great look. 
  • Breathable, stretchy and quick dry for maximum comfort. 
  • One-Year Warrantee, we stand behind our product quality.
  • 100% Money-Back Guarantee, risk free buy.
  • Optimized for the highest level of athletic performance in BJJ, MMA, catch wrestling, no-gi, and submission grappling

The Savage Stripe Women’s Spats feature a durable, light weight fabric designed to keep you dry and moving. Perfect for intense workouts, these compression pants will not lose their stretch or fit no matter the activity. Great as MMA and BJJ spats, for surfing, watersports and as workout compression pants for women.

entry.title: Premium Black Spats
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Men - Spats
Price: 45.00

The Premium Black Spats are a must-have for any dedicated athlete. These compression pants are specifically designed with high-quality material. The prestige pitch-black color allows these compression pants to work well with any training gear and will not fade due to long wear. Great as MMA and BJJ spats, for surfing, watersports, and workout compression pants for men.

WHY PREMIUM?

Black Premium BJJ Spats made with quality material mixture design to last. Multi-panel stitching for extra strength. Specially made for intense MMA grappling and Jiu-Jitsu training.

MATERIAL: Mixture of Polyester and Spandex. This makes this highly strong, durable, flexible, stretchable, non-shrinkable, and lightweight to give its maximum comfort.

DESIGN: A unique and Smart compression design to enhance your blood circulation to the muscles, keeps sweat away, ensuring your body dry, and keeps your muscles warm.

STITCHING: Multi-panel construction, high-density flat-lock stitching for optimal fit and durability. Because of its flexibility, it changes its shape according to your body shape. Which makes this product graceful and elegant.

GRAPHICS: This spat has a black premium color. Black is a formal, elegant, and prestigious color. Authoritative and powerful, the color black can evoke strong emotions.
